      • getTexture

        public static GLTexture getTexture(SimpleTexture tex_descriptor)
        Retrieve or create a simple texture.
        This method is synchrone and wait for the texture task to finish.
        To make asynchrone calls, use the methods #buildTexture(...)
        Parameters:
        tex_descriptor - : the simple texture descriptor.
        Returns:
        a Basic

      • uncacheTexture

        public boolean uncacheTexture(SimpleTexture textureDescriptor)
        remove the texture from the cache. If it exists, task generation is requested to stop and is removed from listened tasks
        Parameters:
        texture - texture to remove from cache
